mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BoardComment (board_comment_no boardno, member_id writer, comment_content content) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{writer}, #{content}, 0, 1, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT board_comment_no commentno, board_no boardno, member_id writer, comment_content content, comment_regdate regdate, comment_deleted deleted FROM BoardComment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} and comment_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY board_comment_no DESC
SELECT commentno, boardno, writer, content, regdate, deleted FROM BoardComment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} and comment_deleted = FALSE ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{count}
